comments:
RECREATING THE PROBLEM
1.  Goto menu Run > Run...
2.  Create new Wireless Toolkit Emulator

MY ENVIRONMENT
Windows XP
Eclipse 3.1.1
EclipseME 0.7.5
J2ME Wireless Toolkit 2.2

ERROR
I get a pop up box telling me to look at error lol after trying to create a new Wireless Toolkit Emulator in the run window.  The following is the error in the error log...

This is a bug with the EclipseME plugin, not Eclipse.  Please file this against their bug tracking system.
